text: aur yadi striyon ko (ek ya do) talaaq de do aur unakee nirdhaarit avadhi (iddat) pooree hone lage, to niyamaanusaar unhen rok lo athava niyamaanusaar vida kar do. unhen haani pahunchaane ke lie na roko, taaki unapar atyaachaar karo aur jo koee aisa karega, vah svayan apane oopar atyaachaar karega tatha allaah kee aayaton (aadeshon) ko upahaas na banao aur apane oopar allaah ke upakaar tatha pustak (quraan) evan haî€¼ikmat (sunnat) ko yaad karo, jinhen usane tumapar utaara hai aur unake dvaara tumhen shiksha de raha hai tatha allaah se daro aur vishvaas rakho ki allaah sab kuchh jaanata hai
